law.text:
It is not a defense to prosecution under this chapter that:
The oath or affirmation was administered or taken in an irregular manner or that the declarant was not competent to make the statement; or
The court in which the acts constituting the offense were committed lacked jurisdiction over the person of the accused or the subject matter.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 197, effective January 1, 1975.
